name: Palpatine
subtitle: Master Manipulator
text: The Focus ([focus]) sides on this die can be used to turn dice in all pool.

name: Circle of Death
text: Resolve one of your dice showing melee damage ([melee]), increasing its value by 1. Then you may spend 1 resource to return a neutral move event from your discard pile to your hand

name: Inquisition
text: Reveal any number of Blue cards from your hand to turn that many opponent's dice to sides showing a blank ([blank]).

name: Spinning Blade
subtypes.text: Return a weapon you control to its owner's hand to deal 2 damage to a characters or 2 damage to each of an opponent's characters instead if that weapon has
Lightsaber
in its title.

subtypes.name: Turn Them to the Dark Side
subtypes.text: Action - Spot a Blue character to choose an opponent's character that has 5 or less remaining health. Then, if that character has no shields and each of its character dice are in a pool showing a blank ([blank]), discard each card on it to take control of it. Set this plot aside.

subtypes.name: Force Grip
subtypes.text:
Blue characters only.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, or 3 damage instead if this upgrade is exhausted. Then you may exaust this upgrade to reroll this die instead of removing it.

subtypes.name: Droideka
subtypes.text: Before this character takes ranged damage ([ranged]) or indirect damage ([indirect]) by an opponent's effect, you may block 1 of that damage if one or more of this character's character dice are in your pool.

subtypes.name: Tarkin
subtypes.subtitle: Endless Ambition
subtypes.text: You can include up to 2 additional plots on your team. Decrease the point value on each of your plots by 1.

subtypes.name: Expunge
subtypes.text: Spot 4 Red cards to name a card. Then search an opponent's deck and discard pile for all copies of the named card and set them aside.

subtypes.name: Lofty Aspirations
subtypes.text:
Ambush.
Remove a die showing a value equal to or less than the number of plots you control.

subtypes.name: Roll Out
subtypes.text: Activate up to 2 of your characters. Then reroll up to 2 of your dice.

subtypes.name: Tarkin Initiative
subtypes.text: Action - Exhaust this plot and spot a Red character to roll this die into your pool. Then you may spot Tarkin to reroll this die.

subtypes.name: AT-AT
subtypes.text:
The cost of this support cannot be decreased by more than 4.
After an opponent's effect removes this die, that opponent discards all cards from their hand.

subtypes.name: Mouse Droid
subtypes.text: This support can be activate. After you activate this support, you may turn one of your dice to a side showing a value of 1. Then you may activate a Red droid you control to draw a card.

subtypes.name: Tie Interceptor
subtypes.text: After an opponent activates a vehicle, you may activate this support. Then if this die is showing ranged damage [ranged], you may remove a vehicle die.

subtypes.name: Uncanny Reflexes
subtypes.text:
Unique character only.
After an opponent's die rolls damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]), you may exhaust this upgrade and remove one of attached character's character dice to remove that die.

subtypes.name: Black Krrsantan
subtypes.subtitle: Ferocious Gladiator
subtypes.text: You may play wild upgrades on this character, ignoring play restrictions. After the upkeep phase begins, you may deal 3 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent unless they discard a support or upgrade they control from play.

subtypes.name: Bossk
subtypes.subtitle: Lone Hunter
subtypes.text: Before you resolve one of this character's character dice, if you control no other characters, you may increase its value by 1.

subtypes.name: Cornelius Evazan
subtypes.subtitle: Mad Doctor
subtypes.text: This character is considered to have 12 bounty downgrades on him that do not count against his downgrade limit. After this character is defeated, each opponent gains 3 resources.

subtypes.name: Jabba the Hutt
subtypes.subtitle: Crime Lord
subtypes.text: After you activate this character, you may spend 1 resource to roll a creature die on a card you control into your pool.

subtypes.name: Brandish
subtypes.text: Spot any number of Yellow cards and spent that number of resources to remove that many dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]).

subtypes.name: Hutt Hospitality
subtypes.text: Choose a character and remove one of its character dice and one of its upgrade dice.

subtypes.name: Savage Impulse
subtypes.text: Remove one of your character dice to discard a support, upgrade or downgrade from play with a cost equal to or less than the value showing on that die.
After you activate this support, you may have each player gain 1 resource.

subtypes.name: Palace Guard
subtypes.text: After you play this support, you may give a character 1 shield or give Jabba the Hutt 2 shields.

subtypes.name: Weequay Thug
subtypes.text: After you play this support, you may remove a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]).

subtypes.name: Gluttony
subtypes.text: [special] - Remove a die (yours or an opponent's) to gain 1 resource.

subtypes.name: Jabba's Rancor
subtypes.subtitle: Savage Monstrosity
subtypes.text: Wild upgrades only. [special] - Deal 2 damage to a character. Then if that character has 2 or less remaining health, defeat it.

subtypes.name: Krayt Dragon
subtypes.text: Wild upgrades only. After setup, set aside all but one of its character dice. After the upkeep phase begins, you may have this character gain one of its character dice that was set aside.

subtypes.name: Malakili
subtypes.subtitle: Attentive Beastmaster
subtypes.text: While one or more of this character's character dice are in your pool, your opponents cannot resolve feral ([feral]) sides on your creature dice. [special] - Gain 1 resource and you may turn one of your creature dice to any side.

subtypes.name: Nexu
subtypes.text: Wild upgrades only. After you activate this character, if its character die rolled a feral ([feral]) side, you may deal 1 damage to a damaged character.

subtypes.name: Wampa
subtypes.text: Wild upgrades only. After an opponent takes damage from this die, you may play a set-aside Mangled ([WH] 33) on it for free. Then if the battlefield is on Hoth deal 1 damage to that character.

subtypes.name: Mangled
subtypes.text:
Damaged character without a Mangled on it only.
Attached character has -1 upgrade limit.

subtypes.name: Cruel Masters
subtypes.text: Deal 1 damage to a creature character you control to resolve one of its character or upgrade dice, increasing its value by 2.

subtypes.name: Hunting Pack
subtypes.text:
You can include up to 3 copies of this event in your deck.
Roll this die into your pool. Then for each copie of this event in your discard pile, roll its die into your pool.

subtypes.name: Infest
subtypes.text:
Ambush.
Return a support, upgrade or downgrade an opponent control to its owner's hand. That opponent gains resources equal to its cost.

subtypes.name: Predator's Grasp
subtypes.text: Ambush. Remove one of your creature dice to remove a die showing a value of 2 or less.

subtypes.name: Rummage
subtypes.text:
Return an upgrade in play to its owner's hand.
Renew - 3 [resource] (You may play this card from your discard pile for its Renew cost. Set it aside.)

subtypes.name: Thrill of the Hunt
subtypes.text: Choose a damaged character and remove one of its character or upgrade dice.

subtypes.name: Through the Trap Door
subtypes.text: Turn a character die to any side. Then you may sreach your deck or discard pile for a card titled Rancor Pit and play it. If you searched your deck, shuffle it.

subtypes.name: Vicious Attack
subtypes.text: Activate one of your creatures. Then you may remove one of its creature or upgrade dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]) to deal 2 damage to a character.

subtypes.name: Bubo
subtypes.text: [special] - Gain 1 resource or remove a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]).

subtypes.name: Rampaging Rathtar
subtypes.text: After you play this support, you may spend 2 resources to have it gain 1 die (place a set-aside copy of its support die on it).

subtypes.name: Rancor Pit
subtypes.text: Before any player resolve a creature die showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]), they may exhaust this support to increase its value by 1.

subtypes.name: Salacious B. Crumb
subtypes.text: After this die is rolled into your pool,reroll up to 2 dice. Then spot Jabba the Hutt to force an opponent to choose and discard a card from their hand.

subtypes.name: Sarlacc
subtypes.text: Power Action - Defeat a character you control to ready this support. [special] - Deal 4 damage to a character or discard another support from play.

subtypes.name: Terentatek
subtypes.text: [special] - Deal 2 damage to a character. If 1 or more of this damage was not blocked, play a set-aside Poisoned ([WH] 49) on that character for free.

subtypes.name: Killer Instinct
subtypes.text: Modify creature character or support. (Play this upgrade only on a creature.) After you activated attached creature, you may reroll one of your Green Dice.

subtypes.name: Poisoned
subtypes.text: After the upkeep phase begins, deal 1 unblockable damage to attached character, or 2 unblockable damage instead if there are 2 or more poison downgrade on it.

subtypes.name: Depa Billaba
subtypes.subtitle: Composed Combatant
subtypes.text: Before you resolve one of this character's character dice, you may increase its value by the number of dice modifying it.

subtypes.name: Mace Windu
subtypes.subtitle: Party Crasher
subtypes.text: Power Action - Discard an upgrade you control. Then play an upgrade from your hand, decreasing its cost by the cost of the discarded upgrade. Return the discarded upgrade to its owner's hand.

subtypes.name: Yoda
subtypes.subtitle: One With the Force
subtypes.text: You may resolve the sides of this die with no symbol as if they were any symbol showing on another one of your dice. Power Action - Turn a die to any side. [special] - Choose one of your non-Yoda dice showing a special ([special]) to use its special ability.

subtypes.name: Grim Determination
subtypes.text: Spot a Blue character with 2 or more upgrades on it to remove a die showing a value of 2 or less.

subtypes.name: Knowledge and Defense
subtypes.text:
Ambush.
 Draw 2 cards and give a character 2 shields.

subtypes.name: Jedi Archives
subtypes.text: During the action phase, play with the top card of your deck revealed. Action - Exhaust this support to play the top card of your deck (paying its cost). You may spend 1 resource to ready this support.

subtypes.name: Champion of the Council
subtypes.text: Jedi character only.Redeploy. Your Jedi dice cannot be rerolled or turned by opponent's effects. Action - Exhaust this upgrade to roll one of attached character's character dice into your pool.

subtypes.name: May the Force Be With You
subtypes.text: Before attached character takes damage, block that damage. Then discard this upgrade.

subtypes.name: BB-8
subtypes.subtitle: Happy Beeps
subtypes.text: After you activate this character, you may place 1 resource on a support or remove 1 damage from a support. Then you may remove 2 resources from a support you control to roll its support die into your pool.

subtypes.name: Han Solo
subtypes.subtitle: Reluctant Captain
subtypes.text: You can include up to 10 Yellow cards in your deck (following deckbuilding restrictions). Power Action - Play a Red card and a Yellow card from your hand in any order.

subtypes.name: Leia Organa
subtypes.subtitle: Headstrong General
subtypes.text: After setup, you may search your deck for a card titled Huttslayer, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck. [special] - Deal 2 damage to a character. If a title upgrade is on this character, gain 1 resource.

subtypes.name: Wedge Antilles
subtypes.subtitle: Renowed and Brave
subtypes.text: Piloting. Power Action - If this character is piloting a support, remove a die showing the same symbol as its piloted support die.

subtypes.name: Clout
subtypes.text:
Decrease the cost of this event by 1 for each different damage symbol ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]) showing on your dice.
Remove a die.

subtypes.name: Preemptive Measures
subtypes.text: For each different damage symbol([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]) showing on your dice, you may remove a die showing that symbol.

subtypes.name: Millennium Falcon
subtypes.text: After you activate this support, you may place 1 resource on it. Power Action - Remove 3 resources from this support to ready it..

subtypes.name: Snowspeeder
subtypes.text: After you activate this support, you may spend 1 resource or spot another Snowspeeder to exhaust a support.

subtypes.name: Huttslayer
subtypes.text: [special] - Remove an opponent's character die. If this upgrade is on Leia Organa, you may defeat a character that has 2 or less remaining health.

subtypes.name: Leia Organa's Blaster
subtypes.text:
Redeploy.
After this upgrade is attached to Leia Organa, you may roll this die into your pool.

subtypes.name: Nien Nunb
subtypes.subtitle: Loyal Smuggler
subtypes.text:
Piloting.
After an opponent gains 1 or more resources during the action phase, you may place 1 resource on this card.
Resources on this card can be used to pay for the first event you play each round.

subtypes.name: A Game of Sabacc
subtypes.text:
Play only if you have 3 or more resources.
Each player reveals 2 cards from their hand. Then the player whose revealed cards have the highest combined cost takes 1 resource from each other players (ignore if there is a tie).

subtypes.name: Haste
subtypes.text:
Ambush.
Play an event from your hand (paying its cost).

subtypes.name: Solicit
subtypes.text: Spot up to 4 Yellow cards to reroll that many dice. Then gain resources equal to the number of different values showing on those dice.

subtypes.name: Subterfuge
subtypes.text: Spot 3 Yellow cards to reroll an opponent's die. Then remove that di if it is showing the same symbol as another die in that opponent's pool.

subtypes.name: Chewbacca
subtypes.subtitle: Champion of Kashyyyk
subtypes.text: After an upgrade is attached to this character for the first time each round, you may deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.

subtypes.name: Dume
subtypes.subtitle: Fight Together
subtypes.text: Ability and wild upgrades only. You can include up to 5 non-villain Blue cards in your deck. You cannot have Kanan Jarrus on your team. [special] - Deal 1 damage to a character. You may turn a die to any side.

subtypes.name: Kaadu Rider
subtypes.text: After you activate this character, you may reroll one of your dice or reroll up to 3 of your dice if a mount is attached to this character.

subtypes.name: Logray
subtypes.subtitle: Bright Tree Village Shaman
subtypes.text: After you activate this character, you may heal 1 damage from a character.

subtypes.name: Loth-Wolf
subtypes.text: Ability and wild upgrades only. The point value of Dume is decreased by 1. [special] - Spot another Green character to gain 1 resource or resolve one of your creature dice, increasing its value by 2.

subtypes.name: Back to basics
subtypes.text:
Return a support or upgrade you own in play to your hand.
Renew - 1 [resource] (You may play this card from your discard pile for its Renew cost. Set it aside.)

subtypes.name: Cycle of Life
subtypes.text:
Place 2 non-event cards from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck in any order.
Renew - 1 [resource] (You may play this card from your discard pile for its Renew cost. Set it aside.)

subtypes.name: Explore
subtypes.text: Choose a color. Then reveal a random card in an opponent's hand. If that card matches the chosen color, gain 1 resource.

subtypes.name: Greater Good
subtypes.text: Remove one of your Green character dice to heal 2 damage from each of your other characters.

subtypes.name: Harmonize
subtypes.text: Reveal 2 cards from your hand that have the same cost to remove a die. If those cards have the same title, draw 2 cards.

subtypes.name: Local Camouflage
subtypes.text: Give a character 1 shield, or 2 shields instead if your battlefield is in play.

subtypes.name: Mutual Accord
subtypes.text: Move a card attached to one of your characters to another one of your characters. You may spot 5 Green cards to remove a die.

subtypes.name: Primeval Endurance
subtypes.text: Return a support or upgrade you control to its owner's hand to remove a die showing a value equal to or less than that card's cost.

subtypes.name: Regrowth
subtypes.text: Return a Green card not titled Regrowth from your discard pile to your hand.

subtypes.name: Revive
subtypes.text:
Heal 2 damage from a character.
Renew - 2 [resource] (You may play this card from your discard pile for its Renew cost. Set it aside.)

subtypes.name: Toss
subtypes.text: Spot a creature to deal 1 damage to a character and remove all of that character's character dice.

subtypes.name: Tauntaun
subtypes.text: Ambush. Redeploy. Power Action - Attach this suport to one of your non-creature characters as an upgrade or unattach it. After you attach this card to a character, you may activate that character.

subtypes.name: Alpha Status
sides.text: Leader character only. After you activate attached character, activate any number of your characters and supports that share a subtype with it.

sides.name: Friendship
sides.text:
After you play this upgrade, return an upgrade you control to its owner's hand.
[special] - Heal 1 damage from a character. You may move this upgrade to a character you control.

sides.name: Instinctive
sides.text: After this upgrade is returned to your hand from your discard pile or from play, you may roll this die or a set-aside copy of this die into your pool.

sides.name: Pack Mentality
sides.text: Modify creature character or support. (Play this upgrade only on a creature.) [special] - For each of your dice showing a special ([special]) (including this die), deal 1 damage to a character.

sides.name: Tracker
sides.text:
After this upgrade is attached to a character, you may roll this die into your pool.
[special] - Deal 1 damage to a character, or 2 damage instead if attached character has 5 or less damage.

sides.name: Heroic Intentions
sides.text: Reroll one of your dice. Then you may resolve that die, increasing its value by 2.

sides.name: Boushh's Helmet
sides.text: Action - Exhaust this upgrade to turn one of attached character's character dice to a side showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]) or a special ([special]).

sides.name: Altering the Deal
sides.text: Choose up to one die in each player's pool. For each chosen die, turn it to any side or remove it. Spot 4 Blue cards to draw a card.

sides.name: Decisive Confrontations.
sides.text: Spot 4 Blue cards to force an opponent to choose a die in their pool. Then resolve that die as if it were in your pool.

sides.name: The Chosen One
sides.text: Anakin Skywalker, Jedi or Sith character only. After you activate attached character, remove a villain die if there are more villain dice in all pools than hero dice, or vice versa.

sides.name: Demolish
sides.text: Resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by 1 for each different damage symbol ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]) showing on all dice (including itself).

sides.name: It Will Be Done
sides.text: Activate one of your Red characters to remove a non-support die.

sides.name: Momentum
sides.text: Spot any number of Red Cards to ready a character with a point value equal to that number. Set this event aside.

sides.name: Vanish
sides.text:
Play only if you control the battlefield.
Choose a damage symbol([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]). Then remove all of an opponent's dice showing that symbol.

sides.name: Mobilize the Reserves
sides.text: After the upkeep phase begins, you may set this plot aside. Then spot a character to add a set-aside character that is 8 or fewer points, and of the same color and affiliation as that character, to your team.

sides.name: General
sides.text: Leader character only. [special] - Turn this die and another one of your dice to the sides of your choice without removing this die from your pool.

sides.name: Confine
sides.text: Look at an opponent's hand. Then you may spend resources equal to the cost of a card in their hand to discard it.

sides.name: Entrap
sides.text: Reroll 2 dice. Then, if those dice are showing different symbols, deal 2 damage each to up to 2 different characters.

sides.name: I Don't Like You, Either.
sides.text: Remove one of your dice to remove up to 2 dice each showing a value of 2 or less.

sides.name: Illicit Shipment
sides.text: Gain 1 resource unless an opponent discards an event from their hand.

sides.name: Interfere
sides.text: Reroll 2 of an opponent's dice. Then, if those dice are showing the same symbol, you may remove one of them.

sides.name: The Modal Nodes
sides.text: There is one additional upkeep phase after the first upkeep phase each round.

sides.name: DL-18 Blaster Pistol
sides.text:
Ambush. Redeploy.
You may resolve the indirect damage ([indirect]) sides of this die as if they were ranged damage ([ranged]) if you discard a Yellow card from your hand.

sides.name: Bendu
sides.subtitle: The One In the Middle
sides.text: You can include Blue neutral cards in your deck. This character is Green and Blue when cheking spot and play restrictions. After you play a disasterr event, you may remove a die.

sides.name: Jawa Forager
sides.text:
Include only if you have a Gray character or another Green character on your team.
After you activate this character, you may play a Green card from your hand (paying its cost). Then draw a card.

sides.name: Mortal Wound
sides.text: Action - If attached character has damage on it equal to or more than half of its health, exhaust this downgrade to remove one of its character or upgrade dice.

sides.name: Avalanche
sides.text:
Spot a Green character to roll this die into your pool and resolve it.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to each of an opponent's characters.

sides.name: From the Depths
sides.text: Set aside any number of Green cards from your discard pile to play a Green card from your hand, decreasing its cost by that number.

sides.name: Into the Wilds
sides.text: Spot a Green character to choose a value and reroll a die. Then, if that die just rolled the chosen value, remove it.

sides.name: Invigorate
sides.text: Spot a Green character to play a Green card from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1.

sides.name: Natural Selection
sides.text: Search the top 3 cards of your deck for a Green card, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Place the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

sides.name: Nature's Wrath
sides.text: Spot 3 Green cards to remove a die. Then set that die and this event aside.

sides.name: One With Nature
sides.text: Search your deck for a wild upgrade, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

sides.name: Playful Spirit
sides.text:
Reroll up to 3 dice(yours and/or opponent's). If you paid this event's Renew cost, draw a card.
Renew - 1 [resource] (You may play this card from your discard pile for its Renew cost. Set it aside.)

sides.name: Primal Urge
sides.text: Resolve one of your creature dice, increasing its value by 1.

sides.name: Pursue
sides.text: Spot acreature to remove a die.

sides.name: Special Bond
sides.text: Activate a character and a creature you control. Then heal 1 damage from a character. Renew - 1 [resource] (You may play this card from your discard pile for its Renew cost. Set it aside.)

sides.name: Stampede
sides.text: Spend up to 8 resources. For each resources spent, roll this die into your pool and resolve it. If you spent 4 or more resources, deal 1 damage to each of an opponent's characters.

sides.name: Tusken Call
sides.text:
Choose and do 1 or, if the battlefield is on Tatooine, choose and do up to 3:
- Use the claim ability on the battlefield.
- Turn a die to a side showing a cost.
- Remove a die showing a value of 3.

sides.name: Violent Storm
sides.text:
Roll this die into your pool.
[special] - Choose up to 2 supports and/or upgrades with a combined cost of 5 or less and discard them from play.

sides.name: Wild Horizons
sides.text:
Remove a Blue, Red or Yellow die.
Renew - 2 [resource] (You may play this card from your discard pile for its Renew cost. Set it aside.)

sides.name: Call of the Wild
sides.text:
Bring 8 different Green events to the game, ignoring deckbuilding restrictions, and place them facedown under this plot in a random order.
After you resolve a Green die, you may exhaust this plot to draw the top card from under it.

sides.name: Traverse the Galaxy
sides.text:
Bring 4 additional different battlefields to the game and place them facedown under this plot.
After you activate a unique Green character, you may exhaust this plot to set a card from under it aside, faceup. Then if all cards under it are set-aside, use each claim ability and power action on them.

sides.name: Bor Gullet
sides.text:
While this die is in your pool, each opponent plays with the top card of their deck revealed.
[special] - Look at an opponent's hand and discard a card from it.

sides.name: Desert Skiff
sides.text: After you activate this support, if the battlefield is on Tatooine, you may activate one of your characters.

sides.name: Dewback
sides.text: Power Action - Attach this card to one of your non-creature characters as an upgrade or unattach it. After this card is attached to a character, you may give that character 1 shield. Gain 1 action.

sides.name: Vitalization
sides.text: Before you play a Green event, you may exhaust this support to decrease its cost or Renew cost by 1.

sides.name: Vulptex
sides.text:
This support can be activated.
After you activate this support, you may spot a Green character to discard the top card of a deck..

sides.name: Brute Strength
sides.text: Green character only.

sides.name: Ferocious
sides.text: Modify creature character or support. (Play this upgrade only on a creature.) After this upgrade is attached to a card, you may deal 1 damage to a character.

sides.name: Jawa Blaster
sides.text: While this upgrade is on a Jawa it has Redeploy.

sides.name: Stone Spear
sides.text: Action - Play this upgrade from your discard pile (paying its cost). .

sides.name: Stand Together
sides.text: Spot a Blue card to remove a support die. Spot a Green card to remove a character die. Spot a Red card to remove an upgrade die. Spot a Yellow card to remove a downgrade or event die.

sides.name: Tame
sides.text: Remove a creature or a wild die.

sides.name: Flow of Battle
sides.text:
After a character is defeated, you may exhaust this support to have an opponent lose 1 resource.
After a character is added to your team, you may exhaust this support to gain 1 resource.

sides.name: Contested Battleground
sides.subtitle: Hoth
sides.text: After you play a card, you may remove a die showing a value equal to the cost of that card. Then give control of this battlefield to an opponent.

sides.name: Dune Sea
sides.subtitle: Tatooine
sides.text: Power Action - Each opponent chooses one of their dice and removes it unless they spend 1 resource.

sides.name: Fetid Swamp
sides.subtitle: Dagobah
sides.text: Claim - Discard the top card of a deck. You may set a card in a discard pile aside. Power Action - Use the claim ability on this battlefield.

sides.name: Great Pit of Carkoon
sides.subtitle: Tatooine
sides.text: Claim - Resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by 1 if it is Green.

sides.name: Ice Cavern
sides.subtitle: Hoth
sides.text: Power Action - Deal 1 damage to a character with a card attached to it.
